role.argrole: thing undertaken / action (usually marked by على)

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-1 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الدول) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC العربية)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN جهة) (ADJ اخرى))) (S (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تقف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC ضد) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN اقدام) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الولايات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المتحدة)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN توجيه) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC ضربة))) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN لعراق))))
